text: I think the workers here are not good at using polite language.. I'm asking you to please monitor the worker's behavior.. he's old, he doesn't need to work anymore, go back, rest your brain
Bus 160 is shitty and infrequent. One bus serving the entire route at 9pm? Shame on you.
Probably one of the worst bus stop in the nation! Dirty, overcrowded from day to night.

Very convenient. Got bus service to Malaysia through Woodlands checkpoint. Bus queues can sometimes be really Long. And occasionally, the bus can take quite a while to come. Even if one arrives, sometimes no one can board it. Not sure why. Worse was when I had to experience this for 3 busses in a row.

Location is just by the Singapore Turf Club.This mrt stn is a connecting point for getting on the Public buses to Johor Baru,Malaysia.Can see a long queue for buses to Johor Baru on Saturdays especially if  the Saturday is a holiday's eve. Also there is a gate within the station with a walkway leading into the SingaporeTurf Club.There are several amenities within the station, e.g. Kopitiam foodcourt, cake shops, mobile phone shop,Malay foods shop,dessert/drinks shop, atms, etc.
Dated : 09/12/2017 ( Saturday ).
